Name: Basic Helmet
Description: A simple helmet offering basic protection.

Name: Traveler's Helm
Description: A lightweight helm offering essential protection, crafted for the agile traveler.

Name: Traveler's Tunic
Description: A sturdy yet comfortable tunic, providing both protection and ease of movement.

Name: Traveler's Gloves
Description: Durable gloves that offer dexterity and protection for handling various tasks.

Name: Traveler's Belt
Description: A versatile belt equipped with pouches, ideal for storing small essentials.

Name: Traveler's Leggings
Description: Comfortable and sturdy leggings designed for long journeys and exploration.

Name: Traveler's Boots
Description: Robust boots made for enduring tough terrains while keeping the wearer nimble.

Name: Explorer's Helm
Description: A technologically advanced helm with enhanced perception capabilities, suitable for various exploration roles.

Name: Explorer's Jacket
Description: A durable jacket featuring built-in tech interfaces for increased intelligence, ideal for diverse exploratory missions.

Name: Explorer's Gloves
Description: Sophisticated gloves providing tactile feedback and enhanced data handling, perfect for detailed exploration tasks.

Name: Explorer's Belt
Description: A versatile utility belt equipped with tools and gadgets to assist in exploration, boosting the wearer's intelligence.

Name: Explorer's Pants
Description: Robust pants designed for rugged environments, offering both comfort and protection.

Name: Explorer's Boots
Description: Heavy-duty boots designed for stability and durability in diverse terrains, enhancing the wearer's navigational abilities.
